Carlo Giardina

About

Gambero Rosso N.334

November cover and illustrations made for @gambero_rosso ü¶ê

The process that leads to the creation of the wine guide made me think about the pleasure of discovery.

The euphoria and the curiosity to explore new worlds with very precise tools supported by passion and wonder.

I imagined surreal worlds composed of streams of wine, bottle-shaped telescopes and ancient stone sculptures: the search for balance, taste and the magical fruits that nature offers to us.
